Element.Name: PAID AMOUNTS
Element.Description: (Aligned) — Breakdown of the paid amount deducted from the amount due.

Element.Name: Payment identifier
Element.Description: (Aligned) — An identifier that references the payment, such as bank transfer identifier.

Element.Name: Paid amount
Element.Description: (Aligned) — The amount of the payment in the invoice currency.

Element.Name: The date when the paid amount is debited to the invoice.
Element.Description: (Aligned) — The date when the prepaid amount was received by the seller.

Element.Name: Payment type
Element.Description: (Aligned) — The date before end of which the terms amount shall be settled.
